column4: I am trying to setup rutorrent, im my remote box, and I was having a bunch of issues, I was wondering if anyone could shed some light and give me a hand setting it up. Id very much appreciate it. When someone has time :)
well im following this guide here http://forums.rutorrent.org/index.php?topic=256.0
trying to setup rutorrent, its setup but I have error 503, and I cannot seem to get the plugins to work. Im not quite sure why.
transmission can be used headlessly if you want, its a little easier
